rev.diff:
Line 11: Line 11:
:"The wives of men of rank when they die are not given at once to be embalmed, nor such women as are very beautiful or of greater regard than others, but on the third or fourth day after their death (and not before) they are delivered to the embalmers. They do so about this matter in order that the embalmers may not abuse their women, for they say that one of them was taken once doing so to the corpse of a woman lately dead, and his fellow-craftsman gave information."</ref><ref>{{cite journal | last1 = Brill | first1 = Abraham A. | year = 1941 | title = Necrophilia | url = | journal = Journal of Criminal Psychopathology | volume = 2 | issue = 4| pages = 433â443 }}</ref><ref name="klaf"/>
:"The wives of men of rank when they die are not given at once to be embalmed, nor such women as are very beautiful or of greater regard than others, but on the third or fourth day after their death (and not before) they are delivered to the embalmers. They do so about this matter in order that the embalmers may not abuse their women, for they say that one of them was taken once doing so to the corpse of a woman lately dead, and his fellow-craftsman gave information."</ref><ref>{{cite journal | last1 = Brill | first1 = Abraham A. | year = 1941 | title = Necrophilia | url = | journal = Journal of Criminal Psychopathology | volume = 2 | issue = 4| pages = 433â443 }}</ref><ref name="klaf"/>
â
In some societies the practice was enacted owing to a belief that the soul of an unmarried woman would not find peace; among the [[Jingpo people|Kachin]] of [[Myanmar]], versions of a marriage ceremony were held to lay a dead virgin to rest, which would involve intercourse with the corpse. Similar practices existed in some pre-modern [[Central Europe]]an societies when a woman who was engaged to be married died before the wedding.
+
In some societies the practice was enacted owing to a belief that the soul of an unmarried woman would not find peace; among the [[Jingpo people|Kachin]] of [[Myanmar]], versions of a marriage ceremony were held to lay a dead virgin to rest, which would involve intercourse with the corpse. Similar practices existed in some pre-modern [[Central Europe]]an societies when a woman who was engaged to be married died before the wedding. Some notably famous necrophiliacs include Nicolas Cage, Glenn Beck and that guy who takes your change at the toll both every morning. A famous incident involving cadavers, ensued when borderline retarded necrophiliac Robby Cowell robbed the medical labs at Syracuse University with his small dick hanging out yelling "It's Gucci time". The following prosecution found that rapper Gucci Mane was in no way involved in this incident although later he was quoted saying "A kid's gotta get his nut."
